title: binutils fails on MacOS
body:
Error message:
```sh
libtool: link: <path>/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/clang -W -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -Wmissing-prototypes -Wshadow -I./../zlib -fPIC -Wl,-no_pie -o .libs/objdump objdump.o dwarf.o prdbg.o rddbg.o debug.o stabs.o ieee.o rdcoff.o bucomm.o version.o filemode.o elfcomm.o od-macho.o od-xcoff.o  ../opcodes/.libs/libopcodes.dylib -L/private/var/folders/lc/b4bjrtcn69d279m6rf4f42y00000gn/T/<user>/spack-stage/spack-stage-kNzi_m/binutils-2.27/opcodes/../libiberty/pic ../bfd/.libs/libbfd.dylib -L/private/var/folders/lc/b4bjrtcn69d279m6rf4f42y00000gn/T/<user>/spack-stage/spack-stage-kNzi_m/binutils-2.27/bfd/../libiberty/pic -L/private/var/folders/lc/b4bjrtcn69d279m6rf4f42y00000gn/T/<user>/spack-stage/spack-stage-kNzi_m/binutils-2.27/zlib -liberty -ldl -lz ../libiberty/libiberty.a ./../intl/libintl.a -liconv
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "_libintl_setlocale", referenced from:
      _main in ar.o
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[4]: *** [ranlib] Error 1
```

This may be related to [this comment](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/2613#issuecomment-269574542). As per the suggestion, it was fixed by adding
```
depends_on('gettext')
```
to list of dependencies. However, I don't know whether this is only a MacOS issue or not.
